section.p: You show the lepers you are not afraid to stay amongst them. They are grateful for your help in various chores that they find difficult. Gain 1 point of SANCTITY.

The next day you set out on your way once more. As you go, one of the lepers warns you: ‘In that direction lies the village of the Bald Ones. Don’t trust them - they’d soon as slit your throat as look at you. The path by their village leads to the heart of the woods.’
